all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Let all the saints rejoice, therefore, and be exceedingly glad; for Israel’s God is their God, and he will mete out a just recompense of reward upon the heads of all their oppressors.
Doctrine and Covenants 127:3
Quote of the Day
"Easter allows us to honor both the atoning sacrifice of Jesus Christ and the literal and joyous Resurrection of Him."
Elder Gary E. Stevenson | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
